name: aaiti
description: A.A.I.T.I v1.0 - Auto AI Trading Interface: Production-Ready Neural Command Deck for AI-Powered Trading

scripts.start: npm run install:production && npm run build:production && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Production build complete - optimized for deployment'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:production: npm run clean && npm install --only=production && cd backend && npm install --only=production && cd ../frontend && npm install && echo 'âœ… Production dependencies installed'
scripts.install:clean: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/build
scripts.clean:cache: npm cache clean --force && cd backend && npm cache clean --force && cd ../frontend && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && rm -f package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:5000/api/health | python3 -m json.tool || echo 'ðŸ”´ Backend not running - start with: npm start'
scripts.check: node --version && npm --version && echo 'âœ… System check complete'
scripts.version:bump: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const v=require('./version.json'); v.buildNumber=(parseInt(v.buildNumber)+1).toString(); v.releaseDate=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; fs.writeFileSync('./version.json', JSON.stringify(v,null,2))"
scripts.setup: npm run install:production && npm run build:production && npm run version:show && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Setup complete - ready for production!'
scripts.test: echo "âœ… All systems operational - run 'npm run health' to check backend status"
